Package gov.sandia.geotess

Class DataArrayOfShorts

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotess.Data
gov.sandia.geotess.DataArrayOfShorts
public class DataArrayOfShorts extends Data
A short[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
